mapper.insert: insert into Ticket(id, titleInfo, hallInfo, dayInfo, timeInfo, numberOfAdult, numberOfTeen, seats, price) VALUES(#{id},#{titleInfo},#{hallInfo},#{dayInfo},#{timeInfo},#{numberOfAdult},#{numberOfTeen},#{seats},#{price});
mapper.select: select seats from Ticket where hallInfo=#{hallInfo} and dayInfo=#{dayInfo} and timeInfo =#{timeInfo};
